definition: An enzyme that catalyzes a reaction in the tricarboxylic acid cycle.
selection_criteria: it catalyzes a reaction in the tricarboxylic acid cycle
referents: Aconitate hydratase, mitochondrial
Pyruvate dehydrogenase E1 component subunit alpha, somatic form, mitochondrial (PHE1A)
Pyruvate dehydrogenase E1 component subunit beta, mitochondrial (PHE1B)
Cytoplasmic aconitate hydratase (IREB1)
Succinate dehydrogenase iron-sulfur subunit, mitochondrial (SDH, SDH1)
Succinate--CoA ligase subunit beta, mitochondrial
NAD(P) transhydrogenase, mitochondrial
2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase-like, mitochondrial (KIAA1290)
Alpha-ketoglutarate dehydrogenase component 4 (MRPS36, DC47)
Dihydrolipoyllysine-residue acetyltransferase component of pyruvate dehydrogenase complex, mitochondrial (DLTA)
Isocitrate dehydrogenase, cytoplasmic (PICD)
Isocitrate dehydrogenase, mitochondrial
Succinate dehydrogenase cytochrome b560 subunit, mitochondrial (CYB560, SDH3)
Succinate dehydrogenase cytochrome b560 subunit, mitochondrial (CYB560, SDH3)
Succinate dehydrogenase flavoprotein subunit, mitochondrial (SDH2, SDHF)
Succinate dehydrogenase flavoprotein subunit, mitochondrial (SDH2, SDHF)
Dihydrolipoyllysine-residue succinyltransferase component of 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase complex, mitochondrial (DLTS)
Dihydrolipoyllysine-residue succinyltransferase component of 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase complex, mitochondrial (DLTS)
Succinate dehydrogenase cytochrome b small subunit, mitochondrial (SDH4)
Succinate dehydrogenase cytochrome b small subunit, mitochondrial (SDH4)
Citrate synthase, mitochondrial
Fumarate hydratase, mitochondrial
Succinate--CoA ligase subunit beta, mitochondrial
Succinate--CoA ligase subunit alpha, mitochondrial
Pyruvate dehydrogenase E1 component subunit alpha, testis-specific form, mitochondrial (PDHAL)
